readable.title: 3325129757_7a1979ac11
readable.content: A guy is watching another guy jump in the air while snowboarding . A person in orange pants is doing tricks on a snowboard while a person in a yellow cap watches . A person sits on a snowbank watching a snowboarder take a high leap . A person watches as a snowboarder does a fancy trick in the air Snowboarder performing a trick high in the air in a snowy area .
